column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////So glad this was close to the Fairmont Hotel where we have stayed.  I heard of long waits so we called in to get reservations for 9a.m on Friday.   Maybe it's summer but there was no wait.  However after 10 a.m
column2: it was super crowded and people are sitting outside looking at their smartphones waiting to get in this pancake/waffle mecca.
